title: Backgrounds
content: Lesser Evils Rob the enthralled fishermen. A Dark Edge Take Shar's dagger from the ritual pedestal. Always a Way Out Help the Moonrise prisoners escape. An Absolute Douceur Accept the Absolute's promise of gifts. Body Heist Open and loot the mind flayer colony's vault. Enter Nostalgia Trespass into Ketheric and Isobel's respective rooms. Escape Artisan Give Wulbren his tools so the gnomes can escape. Fickle Allegiances Betray Balthazar after learning that Nightsong is not a simple relic. Long-A
